articles.title: UK Comedian Tony Knight Dies In “Freak Accident” At 54 - Deadline
articles.description: UK comedian Tony Knight, also known as the Dog Listener, has died after a freak accident at a festival in France.
articles.content: UK comedian Tony Knight, also known as the Dog Listener, has died after a freak accident at a festival in France. The 54-year-old Knight was struck and killed by a large falling tree branch in June a… [+1737 chars]

articles.title: 'A Family Affair' Dethroned In Netflix's Top 10 List By A New Movie - Forbes

articles.content:
